title: Surat Municipal Corporation Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 42 Officer Posts
description: The Surat Municipal Corporation, Gujarat, has released the official notification for 2025. Allotted 42 vacancies for Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, B.Sc, B.E/ B.Tech can grab this chance for the application. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the Surat Municipal Corporation Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or ...
